### Libraries

```{r}
library(here) # easier paths, here() function starts in the folder of the RStudio project
library(tidyverse)
library(brms)
library(tidybayes)
library(ggtern)
library(kableExtra)
library(janitor)

# get custom functions
source(here("scripts/functions.R"))
```

### Get data

Sometimes bouts/bites \> 1 when feeding time = 0, sometimes feeding time \> 0 but bout/bites = 0

```{r}
dat_frate_ab_af <- readRDS(here("data/clean/dat_absent_after.rds")) %>% 
  filter(bite > 0, 
         feeding_time_sec > 0)

dat_frate_ab_af <- dat_frate_ab_af %>% 
  mutate(log_n_frame_total = log(n_frame_total),
         log_depth = log(depth))

dat_frate_ab_af <- dat_frate_ab_af %>% 
  mutate(frate = bite/feeding_time_sec)
```

Bouts per min

```{r}
dat_frate_ab_af %>%
   group_by(size_class, treatment, year) %>%
  #mean feeding time per group
  summarise(
    mean_frate = mean(frate, na.rm = T),
    sd = sd(frate, na.rm = T),
    n = n(),
    se = ifelse(n >= 3, sd / sqrt(n), NA)
  ) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(
    x = treatment,
    ymin = mean_frate - se,
    ymax = mean_frate + se,
    col = factor(treatment),
    width = .4
  )) +
  geom_point(aes(
    x = treatment,
    y = mean_frate,
    col = factor(treatment)
  )) +
  facet_grid(year ~ size_class , scales = "free") +
  theme_clean()
```

Bite rate per video

```{r}

dat_frate_ab_af %>%
  group_by(size_class, treatment, year, video) %>%
  summarise(frate_per_video = mean(frate)) %>% 
   group_by(size_class, treatment, year) %>%
  #mean feeding time per group
  summarise(
    mean_frate = mean(frate_per_video, na.rm = T),
    sd = sd(frate_per_video, na.rm = T),
    n = n(),
    se = ifelse(n >= 3, sd / sqrt(n), NA)
  ) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_errorbar(aes(
    x = treatment,
    ymin = mean_frate - se,
    ymax = mean_frate + se,
    col = factor(treatment),
    width = .4
  )) +
  geom_point(aes(
    x = treatment,
    y = mean_frate,
    col = factor(treatment)
  )) +
  facet_grid(year ~ size_class , scales = "free") +
  theme_clean()

```

Only focus on small fish

```{r}
dat_frate_ab_af_S_16 <- dat_frate_ab_af %>% 
  filter(size_class == "<50", year == 2016) %>% 
  droplevels()
```

focus on 2016, smooth not possible

```{r}
fit_frate_ab_af_S_16 <- brm(frate ~  treatment +
    (1 | video),
  family = Gamma(),
  data = dat_frate_ab_af_S_16,
  iter = 4000,
  warmup = 2000,
  chains = 4,
  cores = 4,
  seed = 123,
  file_refit = "on_change",
  threads = threading(2, static = T),
  file = here("models/dat_frate_ab_af_S"),
  backend = "cmdstanr"
)
```

```{r}
summary(fit_frate_ab_af_S_16)#4
bayes_R2(fit_frate_ab_af_S_16)#0.6791695
pp_check(fit_frate_ab_af_S_16, ndraws = 100)
```

```{r}
epred_frate_ab_af_S_16 <-  epred_draws(
  fit_frate_ab_af_S_16,
  newdata = expand_grid(
    treatment = dat_frate_ab_af_S_16$treatment %>% unique(),
    habitat = dat_frate_ab_af_S_16$habitat %>% unique(),
    log_depth = mean(dat_frate_ab_af_S_16$depth) %>% 
      log(),
    log_n_frame_total = mean(dat_frate_ab_af_S_16$n_frame_total) %>%
      log()
  ),
  re_formula = NA
)
```

```{r}
cols_treat <- c("#FFDB6D", "#4E84C4")

epred_frate_ab_af_S_16 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = .epred, y = 1)) +
  stat_slab(size = .3,
            aes(fill = treatment),
            slab_size = 0.5, 
            alpha = 0.3) +
  stat_slab(show.legend = F, 
            size = .3,
            fill = NA, 
            aes(colour = treatment), 
            slab_size = 0.5) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = cols_treat)+
  scale_fill_manual(values = cols_treat)+
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1)),
         fill = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1)))+
  theme_clean()
```

```{r}
epred_frate_ab_af_S_16_effect <- epred_frate_ab_af_S_16 %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  dplyr::select(
                treatment,
                habitat,
                log_n_frame_total,
                log_depth,
                .draw,
                .epred) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = treatment,
              values_from = .epred) %>%
  mutate(diff = after - absent)
```

```{r}
cols_year <- c("#52854C", "#D16103")


epred_frate_ab_af_S_16_effect %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = diff, y = 1)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, linetype = "11", col = "grey")+
  stat_slab(alpha = 0.3) +
  stat_slab(show.legend = F,size = .5,  fill = NA ) +
  scale_colour_manual(values = cols_year) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = cols_year) +
  guides(color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1)),
         fill = guide_legend(override.aes = list(alpha = 1))) +
  theme_clean()
```

```{r}
epred_frate_ab_af_S_16_effect %>% 
  compare_0(variable = diff)
```
